unique.description: The cache will not allow a masked value to be used multiple times, the mask will be reapplied until a unique value is generated

reverse.description: Reverse the cache, keys will be used as values, and values will be used as keys

header.description: Does the CSV resource contains a header line

comment.description: Lines beginning with the comment character without preceding whitespace are ignored

fieldsPerRecord.description: FieldsPerRecord is the number of expected fields per record, 0 means the number of fields in the first record

trim.description: If true leading white space in a field is ignored

input.description: Characters to replace in the input value

output.description: Characters to use to generate the output value

inputFormat.description: Format of the input datetime, it should always display the following date : Mon Jan 2 15:04:05 -0700 MST 2006 or the constant value 'unixEpoch'

outputFormat.description: Format of the output datetime, it should always display the following date : Mon Jan 2 15:04:05 -0700 MST 2006 or the constant value 'unixEpoch'

version.description: Version of the pipeline definition, use the value 1

seed.description: Initialize the Pseaudo-Random-Generator with the given value

functions.description: Declare functions to be used in the masking

csv.description: Characters exact to match in the csv file

entry.description: Characters exact to find in the entry file

keyFromEnv.description: Name of the system environment variable that contains the private key

tweakField.description: Name of the field to use as 'tweak' value : reduce the attack surface by using a varying value on each record, it can be considered as an extension of the secret key that change on each record

radix.description: determine which part of the fixed FF1 domain definition will actually be used, for example 10 will use the first 10 characters of 0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

domain.description: allowed characters domain that will be encrypted, do not use radix and domain at the same time

preserve.description: preserve characters that are not part of the allowed domain

onError.description: template to execute if there is an error while encrypting value

decrypt.description: Decrypt the value instead of encrypt

exactMatch.description: Compare csv data and entry data, find the exected matched csv line

jaccard.description: Compare csv data and entry data with jaccard, find the similarity matched csv line

expected.description: How much result return, 3 modes availables: only-one, at-least-one, many

header.description: Does the CSV resource contains a header line

comment.description: Lines beginning with the comment character without preceding whitespace are ignored

fieldsPerRecord.description: FieldsPerRecord is the number of expected fields per record, 0 means the number of fields in the first record

trim.description: If true leading white space in a field is ignored

increment.description: Increment to add to reach the next value in the sequence

universe.description: All possible characters that can be encountered as input value

max-size.description: Maximum length for the generated text

sample.description: URI to an external resource to train the Markiv model

separator.description: Separator to use to read tokens, leave empty to treat each character as a token

order.description: Number of tokens to consider, a higher value = more similar to sample, too high and the generated text will be completly similar to sample

add.title: Add Mask
add.description: Add a new field in the JSON stream

add-transient.title: Add Transient Mask
add-transient.description: Add a new temporary field, that will not show in the JSON output

constant.title: Constant Mask
constant.description: Replace the input value with a constant field

randomChoice.title: Random Choice Mask
randomChoice.description: Replace the input value with a value chosen randomly from a constant list

randomChoiceInUri.title: Random Choice in URI
randomChoiceInUri.description: Replace the input value with a value chosen randomly from an external resource (1 line = 1 value)

randomChoiceInCSV.title: Random Choice in CSV
randomChoiceInCSV.description: Replace the input value with a record chosen randomly from an external CSV resource

command.title: Command Mask
command.description: Replace the input value with the result of the given system command

randomInt.title: Random Integer Mask
randomInt.description: Replace the input value with a value chosen randomly from an integer range

weightedChoice.title: Weighted Choice Mask
weightedChoice.description: Replace the input value with a value chosen randomly from a constant list, each value is given a weight (higher weight value has higher chance to be selected)

regex.title: Regex Mask
regex.description: Replace the input value with a random generated value that match the given regular expression

hash.title: Hash Mask
hash.description: Replace the input value with a value chosen deterministically from a constant list, the same input will always be replaced by the same output

hashInUri.title: Hash in URI Mask
hashInUri.description: Replace the input value with a value chosen deterministically from an external resource (1 line = 1 value), the same input will always be replaced by the same output

hashInCSV.title: Hash in CSV
hashInCSV.description: Replace the input value with a record chosen deterministically from an external CSV resource, the same input will always be replaced by the same output

randDate.title: Random Date Mask
randDate.description: Replace the input value with a value chosen randomly from an date range

incremental.title: Incremental Mask
incremental.description: Replace the input value with an incrementing integer sequence

replacement.title: Replacement Mask
replacement.description: Replace the input value with the value of another field

template.title: Template Mask
template.description: Replace the input value with the result of executing the given Golang template

template-each.title: Template Each Mask
template-each.description: Replace all input values (selector must be an array field) with the result of executing the given Golang template on each value

duration.title: Duration Mask
duration.description: Modify the input value (selector must be a date field) increasing or decreasing by the given amount of time

remove.title: Remove Mask
remove.description: Remove the field from the JSON stream

range.title: Range Mask
range.description: Replace the integer value with a range of the given size

randomDuration.title: Random Duration Mask
randomDuration.description: Modify the input value (selector must be a date field) increasing or decreasing by a random amount of time

fluxUri.title: Flux in URI Mask
fluxUri.description: Replace the input value with the next value in the sequence given by an external resource (1 line = 1 value)

randomDecimal.title: Random Decimal Mask
randomDecimal.description: Replace the input value with a value chosen randomly from an decimal range

dateParser.title: Date Parser Mask
dateParser.description: Change the format of the input date

fromCache.title: From Cache Mask
fromCache.description: Replace the input value with the value stored at the corresponding key in the given cache

ff1.title: FF1 Mask
ff1.description: Encrypt the input value using the FF1 algorithm (format preserving encryption)

pipe.title: Pipe Mask
pipe.description: If the input value contains an array of object, stream each object with the given masking pipeline definition, this mask exists to handle complex data structures

fromjson.title: From JSON Mask
fromjson.description: Parse the input value as raw JSON, and add the resulting structure to the JSON stream

luhn.title: Luhn Mask
luhn.description: Concatenate a checksum key to the input value computed with the luhn algorithm

markov.title: Markov Mask
markov.description: Produces pseudo text based on sample text

transcode.title: Transcode Mask
transcode.description: Produce a random string by preserving character classes from the original value

findInCSV.title: Find in CSV Mask
findInCSV.description: Find matched values in a CSV file based on input json file and save the matched csv line as type objet

xml.title: XML Mask
xml.description: Apply mask for XML content within JSON values

timeline.title: TimeLine Mask
timeline.description: Generate a timeline under constraints and rules

selector.description: A selector defines on which field the mask will be applied

selectors.description: Defines on which fields the mask will be applied

mask.description: Defines how the selected value(s) will be masked

masks.description: Defines how the selected value(s) will be masked

cache.description: Use an in-memory cache to preserve coherence between original/masked values

preserve.description: Preserve (do not mask) some values : null = preserve null value, empty = preserve empty strings, blank = preserve both null and empty values, notInCache = preserve value even if not present in cache (fromCache mask)

seed.description: Initialize the Pseaudo-Random-Generator with the value given field

masking.description: Define a list of selector/mask couple to apply on the JSON stream, in this order

injectParent.description: Used in conjunction with the 'pipe' mask, inject the parent object with the given field name

injectRoot.description: Used in conjunction with the 'pipe' mask, inject the root object with the given field name

file.description: URI to an external resource to read the pipeline definition

dateMin.description: Lower bound of the date range

dateMax.description: Higher bound of the date range

min.description: Lower bound of the integer range

max.description: Lower bound of the integer range

min.description: Lower bound of the decimal range

max.description: Lower bound of the decimal range

min.description: Lower bound of the duration range (ISO 8601 notation)

max.description: Higher bound of the duration range (ISO 8601 notation)

field.description: Initialize the Pseaudo-Random-Generator with the given field value, a Golang Template can be used here

jsonpath.description: Path of the target value to mask in the JSON input

item.description: Inject the current element value under the given field name

index.description: Inject the current element index under the given field name

template.description: Replace the current value with the result of executing this Golang template

before.title: Before
before.description: Name the point which should serve as the upper limit

after.title: After
after.description: Name the point which should serve as the lower limit

onError.description: What to do if there is an error : default = use point default value (or null if not set), reject = fail masking for this line, default = use default value for the point

epsilon.description: Minimum period to consider 2 dates unequals for this constraint

name.description: Name of the point in the timeline

from.description: Name of the reference point in the timeline to create this point

min.description: Minimum shift relative to the reference point (ISO 8601 notation)

max.description: Maximum shift relative to the reference point (ISO 8601 notation)

default.description: Name a point of the timeline to use as a default value if a constraint fail (with onError=default)

name.description: Name of the starting point in the timeline

value.description: Value of the starting point in the timeline, in RFC3339 format (2006-01-02T15:04:05Z07:00), if omitted equals to now

format.description: Format of datetimes, it should always display the following date : Mon Jan 2 15:04:05 -0700 MST 2006 or the constant value 'unixEpoch'

points.description: List of points in the timeline

retry.description: Maximum number of retry if constraint fail before error (default : 200)

epsilon.description: Minimum period to consider 2 dates unequals (default : P0)

classes.description: Each class will define a rule to replace a set of characters by another

weight.description: Weight of this choice, higher weights will be selected more frequently

xpath.description: Specifies the XPath expression to target the XML

injectParent.description: Injects the parent element into a variable for access in subsequent masks

masking.description: Sub-list of masks to be applied inside the selected XML element
